text:
Connecting the Dots: How to Avoid Communication Breakdowns Once Your Exchange is up and Running
By Jennifer Milner|Wednesday, December 11, 2013
The key to making a private exchange work on an ongoing basis after launch is communication. While this statement may seem obvious, in my experience in an account management role with our clients, I have found the need to continuously reiterate the importance of communication. Once the project is launched, it is easy to assume it can just coast along. But it cant. Developing and implementing sound communications strategies are necessary for the ongoing success of an exchange.
Below are some of the questions health plan business owners and their private exchange partner should be raising on a regular basis to ensure the private exchange runs smoothly:
